title: International Coding Education (ICE) Challenge - Code Combat (HK-MO-TW)
description: Received Top Coder Certificate in screening round and Gold Award in grand final

title: 5G Campus Application Competition VR/AR STEM Training Workshop
description: Participating teams in the competition attended a 2.5-day VR/AR STEM training workshop and a 0.5-day presentation workshop to enhance our understanding of 5G smart campus design. We learned practical VR/AR production skills, the latest trends in 3D modeling, AR filter creation, basic programming concepts, and presentation skills.

title: 5G Campus Application Competition
description: Teams ranked 4th to 10th will receive Merit Awards.

title: 第二十屆港澳青少年網路技能大賽 2024
CodeQuest International Hackathon
description: Participants ranked in the top 5% will receive the First Prize Award. I achieved 35th place worldwide.

title: Hong Kong Secondary School Coding Challenge
description: I advanced to the finals and received a participation certificate.

title: 2024 Mini Competition 0
description: A online contest held by HKOI

title: Mathematics Day Camp "Boolean Algebra and its Applications"
School Maker Faire
description: I organized and operated two booths with other members of the school's Programming Training Team at the Maker Faire.

title: Artificial Intelligence Literacy Programme
description: I have completed a 60-hour program on machine learning, deep learning, and real-life AI application development.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: I have successfully completed the Machine Learning with Python Developer Certification representing approximately 300 hours of work.

title: International Coding Education (ICE) Challenge - Code Combat (HK-MO-TW)
description: Organized by ICE FOUNDATION, Hong Kong Education City, The Hong Kong Association for Computer Education

title: Youth Organizing Committee
description: I participated in a 25-hour voluntary service with this organization from September to October 2023. My main responsibility was organizing events aimed at teenagers.

title: Mentorship Programme
description: In this program, I had the opportunity to meet mentors from the IT industry who provided support and suggestions for my career development.
